title: The mystery of the temple and city described in the nine last chapters of Ezekiel unfolded ... by William Alleine ...
author: Alleine, William, 1614-1677.
publisher: Printed for B. Harris and are to be sold ... by T. Wall,
notes: Earlier ed. published in 1677 without second part.
In 2 parts: each part has separate t.p. Title of 2nd part: Some discovery of the new heavens and the new earth / by William Alleine. London : for Benjamin Haris, 1679 (pp. 1-188)
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
